statements: SELECT * FROM VocalLibrary WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT publication_date, title FROM VocalLibrary WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT content FROM VocalLibrary WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author FROM VocalLibrary WHERE article_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT author, publication_date FROM VocalLibrary ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM VocalLibrary WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM VocalLibrary WHERE publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT content FROM VocalLibrary WHERE author LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM VocalLibrary WHERE author = 'Alice' AND publication_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM VocalLibrary GROUP BY author HAVING article_count > 1 ORDER BY article_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM vocal_technique_articles WHERE author = 'John Doe'
SELECT article_title, author, publication_date FROM vocal_technique_articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT article_title, content FROM vocal_technique_articles WHERE article_id = 1
SELECT author, publication_date, article_title FROM vocal_technique_articles WHERE author IN ('Jane Smith', 'Alice Lee')
SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date < '2022-02-15'
SELECT article_title, author, publication_date FROM vocal_technique_articles WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE author = 'John Doe' AND publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM vocal_technique_articles WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS num_articles FROM vocal_technique_articles GROUP BY author HAVING num_articles > 1 ORDER BY num_articles DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM research_papers ORDER BY author ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT article_title FROM vocal_technique_articles;
SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM research_papers;
SELECT * FROM singers WHERE experience_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT paper_title, author_name, publication_date FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT singer_name, vocal_range FROM singers WHERE vocal_range LIKE '%Soprano%';
SELECT * FROM vocal_technique_articles WHERE publication_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT article_title, author_name FROM vocal_technique_articles WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT paper_title, author_name, publication_date FROM research_papers ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT singer_id, singer_name FROM singers WHERE vocal_range = 'Soprano' AND experience_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT article_id, article_title, author_name FROM vocal_technique_articles WHERE article_title LIKE '%vocal%' ORDER BY article_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Vocal_Technique_Articles;
SELECT article_id, article_title, author FROM Vocal_Technique_Articles WHERE publication_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, article_title FROM Vocal_Technique_Articles WHERE category = 'Breathing Techniques';
SELECT * FROM Singer_Library WHERE library_id = 1;
SELECT singer_name, vocal_range, experience_years FROM Singers WHERE teacher = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY singer_name ASC, vocal_range DESC
SELECT singer_name, vocal_range FROM Singers JOIN Singer_Library ON Singers.singer_id = Singer_Library.singer_id WHERE article_id = 2 AND paper_id = 5
SELECT * FROM Vocal_Technique_Articles WHERE category = 'Breath Control' OR category = 'Vocal Exercises'
SELECT * FROM Research_Papers WHERE topic LIKE '%Technique%' AND author = 'John Smith'
SELECT singer_name, experience_years, teacher FROM Singers WHERE teacher IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT article_id, title, author, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT a.title, a.author, t.name FROM articles a JOIN article_topics at ON a.article_id = at.article_id JOIN topics t ON at.topic_id = t.topic_id;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, title FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE content LIKE '%database%';
SELECT name AS author_name, nationality FROM authors WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT a.title, t.name AS topic_name FROM articles a INNER JOIN article_topics at ON a.article_id = at.article_id INNER JOIN topics t ON at.topic_id = t.topic_id;
